plugins.name: Nginx
plugins.description: Nginx is a web server and a reverse proxy server for HTTP, HTTPS, SMTP, POP3, and IMAP protocols, with a strong focus on high concurrency, performance and low memory usage.

plugins.name: Redis
plugins.description: Redis is an in-memory data structure store, used as a database, cache and message broker.
